title: Improving gonorrhoea molecular diagnostics: Genome mining-based identification of identical multi-repeat sequences (IMRS) in Neisseria gonorrhoeae
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Clement Shiluli, Shwetha Kamath, Bernard N. Kanoi, Racheal Kimani, Michael Maina, Harrison Waweru, Moses Kamita, Ibrahim Ndirangu, Hussein M. Abkallo, Bernard Oduor, Nicole Pamme, Joshua Dupaty, Catherine M. Klapperich, Srinivasa Raju Lolabattu, Jesse Gitaka
